channel.title: CVE Feed for BoldThemes -- Bold Timeline Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BoldThemes -- Bold Timeline Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-43294|2024-08-18T21:10:53.518Z -- boldthemes -- bold%20timeline%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BoldThemes Bold Timeline Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bold Timeline Lite: from n/a through 1.2.0.
